translation.en: ♪ Sticks and stones, in secret codes We speak a language all our own ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Sticks and stones, in secret codes We speak a language all our own ♪

translation.en: ♪ We hide and seek I follow where you go ♪
translation.vi: ♪ We hide and seek I follow where you go ♪

translation.en: ♪ Your heart is magic Pure and tragic ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Your heart is magic Pure and tragic ♪

translation.en: ♪ Just like mine, but you can have it ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Just like mine, but you can have it ♪

translation.en: -♪ Now until forever, not alone ♪ -[Li Na and Din laughing]
translation.vi: -♪ Now until forever, not alone ♪ -[Li Na and Din laughing]

translation.en: ♪ Paint your dreams on an endless sky ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Paint your dreams on an endless sky ♪

translation.en: -I'm gonna get you! -♪ See the world dancing in your eyes ♪
translation.vi: -I'm gonna get you! -♪ See the world dancing in your eyes ♪

translation.en: [man] ♪ Paint your dreams On an endless sky ♪
translation.vi: [man] ♪ Paint your dreams On an endless sky ♪

translation.en: ♪ I see the world dancing in your eyes ♪
translation.vi: ♪ I see the world dancing in your eyes ♪

translation.en: ♪ Just you and me, you and me ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Just you and me, you and me ♪

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, it's gonna be Gonna be just you and me ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Yeah, it's gonna be Gonna be just you and me ♪

translation.en: ♪ Yeah, it's gonna be Gonna be all right ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Yeah, it's gonna be Gonna be all right ♪

translation.en: Oh, Wei! Wei, Wei, Wei, Wei!
translation.vi: Oh, Wei! Wei, Wei, Wei, Wei!

translation.en: I'm kidding. I'm kidding.
translation.vi: I'm kidding. I'm kidding.

translation.en: [Din's mom] Aiya.
translation.vi: [Din's mom] Aiya.

translation.en: Yeah, I wish to be a princeling.
translation.vi: Yeah, I wish to be a princeling.

translation.en: I just need to reconnect with Li Na. She won't care if I'm poor.
translation.vi: I just need to reconnect with Li Na. She won't care if I'm poor.

translation.en: You found the boy. Where is he?
translation.vi: You found the boy. Where is he?

translation.en: Do you remember when we lived in that old shikumen?
translation.vi: Do you remember when we lived in that old shikumen?

translation.en: But, Dad, don't you ever miss those days?
translation.vi: But, Dad, don't you ever miss those days?

translation.en: I know, there was a parade and everything, but… you had one more wish.
translation.vi: I know, there was a parade and everything, but… you had one more wish.

translation.en: ♪ What would I make a wish ♪
translation.vi: ♪ What would I make a wish ♪

translation.en: ♪ I don't want more than this ♪
translation.vi: ♪ I don't want more than this ♪

translation.en: ♪ Boy, you are the world Every last diamond and pearl ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Boy, you are the world Every last diamond and pearl ♪

translation.en: ♪ Can't put a price tag on a feeling ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Can't put a price tag on a feeling ♪

translation.en: [in English] ♪ Go ahead and move me Clap your hands and feel the beat ♪
translation.vi: [in English] ♪ Go ahead and move me Clap your hands and feel the beat ♪

translation.en: ♪ Do, do, do your thing Like I got nowhere to be ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Do, do, do your thing Like I got nowhere to be ♪

translation.en: ♪ You, you, you and me We got more than any king ♪
translation.vi: ♪ You, you, you and me We got more than any king ♪

translation.en: ♪ Got a priceless energy Taking over me ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Got a priceless energy Taking over me ♪

translation.en: ♪ And I can't stop singing, singing ♪
translation.vi: ♪ And I can't stop singing, singing ♪

translation.en: ♪ Got me dancing on the ceiling ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Got me dancing on the ceiling ♪

translation.en: ♪ All the best things are free Smile don't cost a thing ♪
translation.vi: ♪ All the best things are free Smile don't cost a thing ♪

translation.en: ♪ Can't put a price tag on that feeling ♪
translation.vi: ♪ Can't put a price tag on that feeling ♪
